parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. This parameter is valid only when the TagKey.N parameter is not specified. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource from which you want to remove tags. Set the value to cluster, which indicates E-HPC clusters.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag key of the resource. You can specify up to 20 tag keys.
